Certificate Requirements: Minimum 17 credits, including a minimum of 3 courses completed in residence at UMBC
Minimum grade of 'B' in courses applied to the certificate
Not open to students pursuing a Modern Languages, Linguistics & Intercultural Communication major or minor

Complete 6 credits from the following:: KORE 310 - Korean Language in Social and Cultural Context (3)
MLL 315 - Images of Society in Contemporary Korean Films (3)
